title: Amazing experience
description: Food was excellent, staff - super friendly, I am definitely comming back

title: Worth trying
description: Liked the food, but the service could be more efficient

title: Could be better
description: Nothing exceptional, and the soup was cold

title: Waste of time
description: I am sure their home-made sandwiches are made by the staff of a nearby supermarket

title: Average
description: It is fine to try, if you are very hungry
